sections.title: 2 cups black-eyed peas
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
2 cups black-eyed peas
o
1 small onion
o
2 cloves garlic
o
1 teaspoon salt
o
Oil for frying
*

sections.title: Soak black eyed
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Soak black-eyed peas overnight, then peel and rinse.
o
Blend peas with diced onion, minced garlic, and salt until smooth.
o
Form mixture into balls and fry in hot oil until golden.
o
Drain on paper towels and serve warm.

sections.title: Soak black eyed
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
1 block tofu
o
1/4 cup cornstarch
o
1 cup dashi broth
o
2 tablespoons soy sauce
o
1 tablespoon mirin
o
1/4 cup green onions
o
1/4 cup grated daikon
*

sections.title: Cut tofu into cubes
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Cut tofu into cubes and coat with cornstarch.
o
Fry in hot oil until golden.
o
Heat dashi broth with soy sauce and mirin.
o
Serve tofu in broth, topped with green onions and grated daikon.

sections.title: Cut tofu into cubes
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
2 potatoes
o
1 cauliflower
o
1 small onion
o
2 cloves garlic
o
1 teaspoon cumin
o
1 teaspoon turmeric
o
1 teaspoon coriander
o
1 teaspoon garam masala
o
1 teaspoon salt
o
2 tablespoons oil
*

sections.title: Peel and dice potatoes
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Peel and dice potatoes, cut cauliflower into florets.
o
Heat oil in a pan and saute diced onion and minced garlic until translucent.
o
Add cumin, turmeric, coriander, and garam masala, cook for 1 minute.

sections.title: Peel and dice potatoes
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
1/2 pound ground beef
o
1/2 pound ground pork
o
1 small onion
o
2 cloves garlic
o
1/4 cup breadcrumbs
o
1 egg
o
1 teaspoon paprika
o
1 teaspoon salt
o
1/2 teaspoon pepper
o
1/4 cup olive oil
o
1 cup tomato sauce
*

sections.title: Mix ground beef, ground pork, diced onion, minced garlic, breadcrumbs, beaten
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Mix ground beef, ground pork, diced onion, minced garlic, breadcrumbs, beaten
egg, paprika, salt, and pepper in a bowl.
o
Form mixture into meatballs.
o
Heat olive oil in a pan and brown meatballs on all sides.
o
Add tomato sauce and simmer for 20 minutes.
o
Serve warm.

sections.title: Mix ground beef, ground pork, diced onion, minced garlic, breadcrumbs, beaten
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
Assorted cured meats (salami, prosciutto)
o
Cheeses (mozzarella, provolone)
o
Olives
o
Marinated vegetables (artichokes, peppers)
o
Breadsticks
*

sections.title: Arrange meats cheeses
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Arrange meats, cheeses, olives, and vegetables on a platter.
o
Serve with breadsticks.

sections.title: Arrange meats cheeses
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
2 cups cooked risotto
o
1/2 cup mozzarella
o
1/2 cup flour
o
2 eggs
o
1 cup breadcrumbs
o
1 cup vegetable oil

sections.title: Form risotto into
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Form risotto into balls and stuff with a cube of mozzarella.
o
Dredge balls in flour, dip in beaten eggs, and coat with breadcrumbs.
o
Fry in hot oil until golden.
o
Drain on paper towels and serve warm.

sections.title: Form risotto into
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
2 eggplants
o
1/4 cup tahini
o
1/4 cup lemon juice
o
2 cloves garlic
o
1/4 cup olive oil
o
1 teaspoon salt
*

sections.title: Roast eggplants
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Roast eggplants until soft, then peel and mash.
o
Blend mashed eggplant, tahini, lemon juice, minced garlic, and salt in a food
processor.
o
Slowly add olive oil while blending until smooth.
o
Serve with a drizzle of olive oil.

sections.title: Roast eggplants
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
4 cups cooked navy beans
o
1 small onion
o
1/2 cup molasses
o
1/4 cup brown sugar
o
1/4 cup ketchup
o
1 tablespoon mustard
o
1 teaspoon salt
o
1/2 teaspoon pepper
*

sections.title: Preheat oven to
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Preheat oven to 350degF (175degC).
o
Saute diced onion until translucent.
o
Mix beans, onion, molasses, brown sugar, ketchup, mustard, salt, and pepper in a
baking dish.
o
Bake for 1 hour, stirring occasionally.
o
Serve warm.
Bammy
*

sections.title: Preheat oven to
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
2 cups grated cassava
o
1/4 cup coconut milk
o
1 teaspoon salt

sections.title: Mix grated cassava
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Mix grated cassava with coconut milk and salt.
o
Form mixture into flat cakes.
o
Fry in hot oil until golden.
o
Drain on paper towels and serve warm.
Banchan
*

sections.title: Mix grated cassava
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
Assorted small side dishes like pickled radish, spinach, bean sprouts, kimchi
*

sections.title: Prepare each side
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Prepare each side dish separately.
o
Arrange on small plates.
o
Serve as accompaniments to the main meal.

sections.title: Prepare each side
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
1 cup rice flour
o
1/2 cup water
o
1/2 cup coconut milk
o
1/4 cup shrimp
o
1/4 cup green onions
o
1/4 cup fried shallots
o
1 teaspoon salt
o
1/2 teaspoon sugar
*

sections.title: Mix rice flour water
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Mix rice flour, water, coconut milk, salt, and sugar to form a batter.
o
Pour batter into small dishes and steam until set.
o
Saute chopped shrimp and green onions until cooked.
o
Top steamed cakes with shrimp, green onions, and fried shallots.
o
Serve with dipping sauce.

sections.title: Mix rice flour water
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
1 cup rice flour
o
1/2 cup coconut milk
o
1/2 cup water
o
1/2 pound shrimp
o
1/2 pound pork
o
1 small onion
o
1/2 cup bean sprouts
o
1/4 cup green onions
o
1/4 cup cilantro
o
1 teaspoon turmeric

sections.title: Mix rice flour coconut
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Mix rice flour, coconut milk, water, turmeric, and salt to form a batter.
o
Saute sliced pork, shrimp, and diced onion until cooked.
o
Heat oil in a pan and pour in a ladle of batter, swirling to coat the pan.
o
Add cooked pork, shrimp, bean sprouts, green onions, and cilantro.
o
Fold pancake in half and cook until crispy.
o
Serve with lettuce and dipping sauce.

sections.title: Mix rice flour coconut
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
1 pound beef tenderloin
o
1/4 cup paprika
o
2 tablespoons cumin
o
2 tablespoons fenugreek
o
1 tablespoon garlic powder
o
1 tablespoon salt
*

sections.title: Rub beef with salt
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Rub beef with salt and let cure in the refrigerator for 24 hours.
o
Rinse and pat dry.
o
Mix paprika, cumin, fenugreek, and garlic powder, then coat beef with the
mixture.
o
Wrap in cheesecloth and hang in a cool, dry place for 1-2 weeks.
o
Slice thinly and serve.
Batbout
*

sections.title: Rub beef with salt
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
2 1/4 teaspoons active dry yeast
o
1 teaspoon sugar
o
1 cup warm water
o
3 cups flour
o
1 teaspoon salt
o
1/4 cup olive oil
*

sections.title: Dissolve yeast and
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Dissolve yeast and sugar in warm water, let sit until foamy.
o
Mix flour and salt in a bowl, then add yeast mixture and olive oil.
o
Knead until smooth, then let rise until doubled.
o
Divide dough into balls and roll out into circles.
o
Cook on a hot griddle until puffed and golden.
o
Serve warm.

sections.title: Wash and dry okra
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Wash and dry okra, then cut into pieces.
o
Heat oil in a pan and saute diced onion and minced garlic until translucent.
o
Add cumin, coriander, turmeric, and garam masala, cook for 1 minute.
o
Add okra and stir to coat with spices.
o
Cook until okra is tender, stirring occasionally.
o
Add salt to taste and serve.
Bobotie
*

sections.title: Wash and dry okra
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
1 pound ground beef
o
1 small onion
o
2 cloves garlic
o
1/4 cup raisins
o
1/4 cup almonds
o
1 tablespoon curry powder
o
1 teaspoon salt
o
1/2 teaspoon pepper
o
2 eggs
o
1/2 cup milk
o
1/4 cup breadcrumbs
*

sections.title: Preheat oven to
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Preheat oven to 350degF (175degC).
o
Saute diced onion and minced garlic until softened.
o
Add ground beef, raisins, almonds, curry powder, salt, and pepper, cook until
beef is browned.
o
Transfer mixture to a baking dish.
o
Beat eggs with milk and pour over the beef mixture.
o
Sprinkle with breadcrumbs.
o
Bake for 30 minutes until set and golden.
o
Serve warm.

sections.title: Bok Choy with Garlic
sections.context:
Bok Choy with Garlic
*

sections.title: Bok Choy with Garlic
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
1 pound bok choy

sections.title: Saute minced garlic
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Saute minced garlic in sesame oil until fragrant.
o
Add bok choy and stir-fry until tender.
o
Add soy sauce and cook for 2 minutes.
o
Serve warm.

sections.title: Bolinho de Bacalhau
sections.context:
Bolinho de Bacalhau
*

sections.title: Bolinho de Bacalhau
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
1 pound salted cod
o
4 potatoes
o
1 small onion
o
2 cloves garlic
o
1/4 cup parsley
o
2 eggs
o
1 cup breadcrumbs
o
Oil for frying
*

sections.title: Soak salted cod
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Soak salted cod in water overnight, then rinse and flake.
o
Boil potatoes until tender, then mash.
o
Mix cod with mashed potatoes, diced onion, minced garlic, chopped parsley, and
beaten eggs.
o
Form mixture into balls and coat with breadcrumbs.
o
Fry in hot oil until golden.
o
Drain on paper towels and serve warm.

sections.title: Soak salted cod
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
1 pound fish fillets
o
1/2 pound shrimp
o
1/2 pound mussels
o
1 small onion
o
2 cloves garlic
o
4 tomatoes
o
4 cups fish stock
o
1/2 cup white wine
o
1 teaspoon saffron
o
1 teaspoon thyme
o
1 teaspoon salt
o
1/2 teaspoon pepper
*

sections.title: Saute diced onion
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Saute diced onion and minced garlic in olive oil until softened.

sections.title: Saute diced onion
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
4 potatoes
o
1 small onion
o
1/4 cup bacon
o
2 tablespoons butter
o
1 teaspoon salt
o
1/2 teaspoon pepper
*

sections.title: Boil potatoes until
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Boil potatoes until tender, then slice.
o
Cook diced bacon until crispy, then remove and set aside.
o
Saute sliced potatoes and diced onion in butter until golden.
o
Stir in bacon, salt, and pepper.
o
Serve warm.
Briam
*

sections.title: Boil potatoes until
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
2 potatoes
o
2 zucchinis
o
2 eggplants
o
2 tomatoes
o
1 small onion
o
4 cloves garlic
o
1/4 cup olive oil
o
1 teaspoon oregano
o
1 teaspoon salt
o
1/2 teaspoon pepper
*

sections.title: Preheat oven to
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Preheat oven to 375degF (190degC).
o
Slice potatoes, zucchinis, eggplants, and tomatoes.
o
Saute diced onion and minced garlic in olive oil until softened.
o
Layer vegetables in a baking dish, seasoning with oregano, salt, and pepper.
o
Pour sauteed onion and garlic over the top.
o
Bake for 45 minutes until vegetables are tender.
o
Serve warm.

sections.title: Preheat oven to
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
1/2 pound ground beef

sections.title: Saute ground beef
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Saute ground beef, diced onion, and minced garlic until cooked.
o
Stir in chopped parsley, cumin, cinnamon, salt, and pepper.
o
Cut phyllo dough into strips and brush with melted butter.
o
Place a spoonful of filling on each strip and fold into triangles.
o
Fry in hot oil until golden.
o
Drain on paper towels and serve warm.

sections.title: Saute ground beef
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
1 baguette
o
4 tomatoes
o
1/4 cup basil
o
2 cloves garlic
o
1/4 cup olive oil
o
1 teaspoon salt
*

sections.title: Slice baguette and
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Slice baguette and toast until golden.
o
Dice tomatoes and chop basil.
o
Mix tomatoes, basil, minced garlic, olive oil, and salt.
o
Spoon mixture onto toasted bread and serve.

sections.title: Slice baguette and
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
1 cup bulgur
o
2 cups chicken broth
o
1 small onion
o
1 carrot
o
1/4 cup parsley
o
2 tablespoons olive oil
o
1 teaspoon salt
*

sections.title: Saute diced onion
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Saute diced onion and grated carrot in olive oil until softened.
o
Add bulgur and cook for 2 minutes.

sections.title: Saute diced onion
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
2 eggplants
o
2 cloves garlic
o
2 tablespoons fish sauce
o
1 tablespoon lime juice
o
1 tablespoon sugar
o
1/4 cup cilantro
*

sections.title: Grill eggplants
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Grill eggplants until charred and tender.
o
Peel and slice eggplants.
o
Mix minced garlic, fish sauce, lime juice, and sugar in a bowl.
o
Toss eggplants with the dressing.
o
Garnish with chopped cilantro and serve.

sections.title: Grill eggplants
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
1 pound callaloo leaves
o
1 small onion
o
2 cloves garlic
o
1/4 cup coconut milk
o
1 teaspoon thyme
o
1 teaspoon salt
o
1/2 teaspoon pepper
*

sections.title: Saute diced onion
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Saute diced onion and minced garlic until softened.
o
Add callaloo leaves and cook until wilted.
o
Stir in coconut milk, thyme, salt, and pepper.
o
Simmer for 10 minutes.
o
Serve warm.

sections.title: Saute diced onion
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
4 cups fish stock
o
1/2 pound fish fillets
o
1 cup pineapple
o
1 cup tomatoes
o
1 cup bean sprouts
o
2 stalks lemongrass

sections.title: Bring fish stock
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Bring fish stock to a boil.
o
Add lemongrass, chilies, and tamarind paste, simmer for 10 minutes.
o
Add pineapple, tomatoes, and fish fillets, cook until fish is done.
o
Stir in fish sauce, sugar, and bean sprouts.
o
Garnish with chopped cilantro and serve.

sections.title: Bring fish stock
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
4 tomatoes
o
1 pound fresh mozzarella
o
1/4 cup basil
o
2 tablespoons olive oil
o
1 tablespoon balsamic glaze
o
1 teaspoon salt
*

sections.title: Slice tomatoes and
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Slice tomatoes and mozzarella.
o
Arrange on a plate, alternating slices.
o
Sprinkle with chopped basil, olive oil, balsamic glaze, and salt.
o
Serve immediately.

sections.title: Slice tomatoes and
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
4 carrots
o
1/4 cup raisins
o
1/4 cup parsley
o
1/4 cup lemon juice
o
1/4 cup olive oil
o
1 teaspoon cumin
o
1 teaspoon salt
*

sections.title: Grate carrots and
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Grate carrots and mix with raisins and chopped parsley.
o
Whisk lemon juice, olive oil, cumin, and salt, then pour over salad.
o
Toss well and serve chilled.
Ceviche
*

sections.title: Grate carrots and
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
1 pound fresh fish or shrimp
o
1 cup lime juice

sections.title: Dice fish or shrimp
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Dice fish or shrimp and place in a bowl.
o
Pour lime juice over the seafood and let marinate for 30 minutes.
o
Dice onion, tomatoes, and jalapeno.
o
Chop cilantro.
o
Mix all ingredients together and add salt.
o
Serve chilled.
Cha Gio
*

sections.title: Dice fish or shrimp
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
1 package spring roll wrappers
o
1/2 pound ground pork
o
1/2 cup shrimp
o
1/2 cup mushrooms
o
1/4 cup carrots
o
1/4 cup green onions
o
2 cloves garlic
o
2 tablespoons fish sauce
o
1 tablespoon sugar
o
Oil for frying
*

sections.title: Mix ground pork, chopped shrimp, diced mushrooms, julienned carrots, chopped
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Mix ground pork, chopped shrimp, diced mushrooms, julienned carrots, chopped
green onions, minced garlic, fish sauce, and sugar in a bowl.
o
Place a spoonful of filling on each wrapper and roll tightly.
o
Fry in hot oil until golden.
o
Drain on paper towels and serve with dipping sauce.

sections.title: Mix ground pork, chopped shrimp, diced mushrooms, julienned carrots, chopped
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
4 tomatoes
o
2 bell peppers
o
1 small onion
o
2 cloves garlic
o
1/4 cup olive oil
o
1 teaspoon cumin
o
1 teaspoon paprika
o
1 teaspoon salt
o
4 eggs
o
1/4 cup cilantro

sections.title: Saute diced onion, minced garlic, and sliced bell peppers in olive oil until
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Saute diced onion, minced garlic, and sliced bell peppers in olive oil until
softened.
o
Add diced tomatoes, cumin, paprika, and salt, simmer for 10 minutes.
o
Make wells in the sauce and crack eggs into each well.
o
Cover and cook until eggs are set.
o
Garnish with chopped cilantro and serve warm.

sections.title: Saute diced onion, minced garlic, and sliced bell peppers in olive oil until
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
2 cups cooked chickpeas
o
1 small onion
o
2 cloves garlic
o
1 teaspoon cumin
o
1 teaspoon coriander
o
1 teaspoon garam masala
o
1 teaspoon turmeric
o
1 teaspoon salt
o
1 can diced tomatoes
o
2 tablespoons oil
*

sections.title: Heat oil in a
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Heat oil in a pan and saute diced onion and minced garlic until translucent.
o
Add cumin, coriander, garam masala, and turmeric, cook for 1 minute.
o
Add chickpeas and diced tomatoes, stir to combine.
o
Simmer for 15 minutes, stirring occasionally.
o
Add salt to taste and serve.
Chapati
*

sections.title: Heat oil in a
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
2 cups flour
o
1/4 cup oil
o
1/2 cup water
o
1 teaspoon salt
*

sections.title: Mix flour oil water
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Mix flour, oil, water, and salt to form a dough, then let rest.
o
Divide dough into balls and roll out into circles.
o
Cook on a hot griddle until golden on both sides.
o
Serve warm.

sections.title: Mix flour oil water
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
1 pound pork shoulder
o
1/4 cup hoisin sauce
o
2 tablespoons soy sauce

sections.title: Mix hoisin sauce, soy sauce, honey, rice wine, five-spice powder, and garlic
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Mix hoisin sauce, soy sauce, honey, rice wine, five-spice powder, and garlic
powder in a bowl.
o
Marinate pork in the mixture for at least 2 hours.
o
Preheat oven to 375degF (190degC).
o
Place pork on a baking sheet and roast for 45 minutes, basting occasionally.
o
Let rest before slicing and serving.

sections.title: Mix hoisin sauce, soy sauce, honey, rice wine, five-spice powder, and garlic
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
2 eggs
o
1 cup dashi broth
o
1 tablespoon soy sauce
o
1 tablespoon mirin
o
1/4 cup chicken
o
1/4 cup shrimp
o
1/4 cup mushrooms
*

sections.title: Beat eggs with dashi
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Beat eggs with dashi broth, soy sauce, and mirin.
o
Place chicken, shrimp, and mushrooms in small bowls.
o
Pour egg mixture over the top.
o
Steam for 15 minutes until set.
o
Serve warm.

sections.title: Beat eggs with dashi
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
4 poblano peppers
o
1 cup shredded cheese
o
1/2 cup flour
o
4 eggs
o
1 cup vegetable oil
o
1 cup tomato sauce
*

sections.title: Roast peppers until
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Roast peppers until charred, then peel and remove seeds.
o
Stuff peppers with cheese.
o
Separate eggs and beat whites until stiff, then fold in yolks.
o
Dredge peppers in flour, then dip in egg mixture.
o
Fry in hot oil until golden.
o
Serve with warmed tomato sauce.
